General.Name: WhiteSmoke Software Ltd
General.Description: WhiteSmoke Software Ltd develops English correction and writing enhancement software solutions in Israel. The company offers WhiteSmoke Writer, an English proofreading software; WhiteSmoke Toolbar, a search monetization software; online video advertising software for on desktop and mobile devices; and natural language processing software, a way for computers to analyze, understand, and derive meaning from human language. It serves native and non-native English speakers. The company was formerly known as Eldan-Tech Ltd. and changed its name to WhiteSmoke Software Ltd as a result of its merger with WhiteSmoke Inc. in January 2013. WhiteSmoke Software Ltd was incorporated in 1981 and is based in Tel Aviv, Israel.

3.Name: Mr. Yaroslav  Fyodorov
3.Title: VP of Technologies - Whitesmoke Israel Advanced Technologies Ltd
